name: UptoTelegraph Nexa bot
description: A Simple bot for uploading telegram images , small videos and some types of stickers

API_ID.description: Your API_ID from https://my.telegram.org/apps . Use your own API ID

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH from https://my.telegram.org/apps . Use your own API HASH

FROM_CHANNEL.description: The ID of the main channel from where posts have to be copied. (Use @chnlidbot to get it.)

TO_CHANNEL.description: The ID of the channel to which the posts are to be sent. (Use @chnlidbot to get it.)
